argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualssvscl.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualssvscl.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ldualssvscl.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 4 |  | ldualssvscl.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) |
| 5 |  | ldualssvscl.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` D ) |
| 6 |  | ldualssvscl.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 7 |  | ldualssvscl.u | |- ( ph -> U e. S ) |
| 8 |  | ldualssvscl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. K ) |
| 9 |  | ldualssvscl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) |
| 10 | 3, 6 | #P_lduallmod | |- ( ph -> D e. LMod ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` D ) = ( Scalar ` D ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` D ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` D ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 11, 12, 6 | #P_ldualsbase | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( Scalar ` D ) ) = K ) |
| 14 | 8, 13 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` D ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 4, 12, 5 | #P_lssvscl | |- ( ( ( D e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ ( X e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` D ) ) /\ Y e. U ) ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. U ) |
| 16 | 10, 7, 14, 9, 15 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. Y ) e. U ) |
